title: Tight-Lipped Running Back Marshawn Lynch Opens His Heart To Oakland
teaser: In the lead up to the Super Bowl, there is one Seattle Seahawks player who's getting a lot of media attention â€” even though he refuses to talk to the media. Star running back Marshawn Lynch blends his bad boy personality with his good deeds reputation in his hometown of Oakland, California.
